description: The demolition of existing buildings on the site of 335-337 Bromley Road SE6 and the construction of a part three/part four storey building, five storey and part two to nine storey buildings, incorporating balconies, comprising 475m2 of Use Class A1 floor space (retail) and 109m2 of Use Class A3 floor space (restaurant/cafe) on part of the ground floor and a total of 71, one bedroom, 61, two bedroom, 8, three bedroom and 1, studio, self-contained flats, together with associated landscaping, provision of refuse/recycling stores and 200 cycle spaces, 37 motorcycle and 85 car parking spaces at basement/mezzanine basement levels, with access onto Whitefoot Lane.
